column5: Hey guys, How can i put pictures into my posts?Thanks for any replies!

Sign up at www.photobucket.com. Once signed up, you log in. Upload pictures to photobucket. Now once it is uploaded, there are 3 codes for that picture right below. If you want to post it directly to the post on OFC, hilight the  tag/code then right click and finally go to your post and right click and paste. If you have more that one picture make sure you put the copied tag/code under each other. If you put the code side by side you will make a mess.
Hi here's a faq on how to post pics. Click Here
Oops, irishfield beat me by a few seconds!!
Thanks for your help, lets hope i got it to work.

Bingo.  Are we great around here or what?  If Photobucket hosts your pictures, they look a little nicer on the page.  Since you are feeling all frisky, why not give the same thing a try on Photobucket?  You still need to resize your pictures first, i think.

Ahhh this is great, Gerritt told me about this but I didnt fully understand what he meant by post them on photobucket. He never mentioned the img tag, hence my confusion. I can finally start getting some pics on here
You can post most pictures on the internet here on this board, by using image tags, that look like this:
Alright thanks a lot guys for the help, i just made my new topic and posted the pics, but i think i made them to big, i dont know how to make them thumbnails
It turned out fine. Just one more hint- hit enter in between the pics to space them.
Thanks so much bernie, helped me out like crazy!
Rein, pretty darn sure that it looks like a picture.
